channel.title: Loading char files for 2 worlds
channel.description:
Go To Playersava.java And Find [code]characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./Data/characters/"+playerName+".txt"));[/code]
Replace With
[Code]characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("C:/Users/Null/Desktop/Characters"+playerName+".txt"));[/Code]
Or Something similar You Make a folder on your desktop and change the directory.
Now Search For [code]characterfile = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./Data/characters/"+p.playerName+".txt"));[/code] And Change To
[Code]characterfile = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Users/Null/Desktop/Characters"+p.playerName+".txt"));[/Code]
Or What Ever The Folder U want Leading To The Char Files. [/CENTER] kind of a snippet but lol
Credits: mystic-effect me
[img]http://blog.remixtechnology.com/assets/2008/12/1/kfc-bankrupt.gif[/img]
